name: Harvest
description:
Farming ain't easy, and in this case, potentially dangerous. But fear not! Your skills of running, dashing, and jumping won't fail you...most of the time. Sell the fruit and veggies you collect in your farm for profit, unlock over 30 characters, complete dozens of challenges, and build the biggest and best farm you can!

Harvest features a range of accessibility options such as:

- Colourblind modes
- Optional Screen shake
- Touch Sensitivity
- A unique feature called Game Direction. Most runners see the player running from the left of the screen to the right, but Harvest can do both.

We believe mobile games shouldn’t be excluded from featuring the range of settings you would see in a typical console or PC game.

Emoji provided free by http://emojione.com/
